Summary: Triangle formation of mutiple lighted red and bright clear flashing light that appeared over an entire corn field.
divs: sighting detailsi left my job at 10pm 8\11\12. i was on my way home when i noticed a very large triangle of lights in the sky over a corn field. the lights were red and very bright. the lights were flashing. some of the lighted object seems to descend on both bottom end of the trianglar formation. i continued driving and looking back. as i move away from the site, the light began to fade away. this is an experience i will never forget.
trends: there have been no other sightings in big lake \ monticello
This sighting has never been favorited.
